message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you. How about a starting price of $11,000?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. However, the value of this product is quite high, and $9,500 is cutting it a bit close to my bottom line.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,500?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,800. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go all the way to $10,500.
